import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { ProductPage } from "../Product"; const Headerstyle = ({ fontColor }) => ({ padding: "1.5vw", fontSize: "1.8vw", width: 952, fontFamily: "源ノ角ゴシック JP,ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro", fontWeight: "bold", color: fontColor ? fontColor : "white", textDecoration: "none", }); const HeaderMenu = ({ children }) => (
Home About Works News Blog Contact
{children}
); export default HeaderMenu;
